# Setting up data

### Load functions

```{r}
load(file='/home/projects/22140/exam_data/exam_functions.Rdata')
```

### Load isoform count matrices

```{r}
GSE208783_isoform_matrix <- loadIsoformCountMatrix("GSE208783,GSE208784")
```

```{r}
GSE106608_isoform_matrix <- loadIsoformCountMatrix("GSE106608")
```

### Load gene count matrices

```{r}
GSE208783_gene_matrix <- extractGeneCountMatrixFromIsoCounts(GSE208783_isoform_matrix)
```

```{r}
head(GSE208783_gene_matrix)
```

```{r}
GSE106608_gene_matrix <- extractGeneCountMatrixFromIsoCounts(GSE106608_isoform_matrix)
```

```{r}
head(GSE106608_gene_matrix)
```
